section.title: Description
section.p: This tool is used to reload the Rule Attributes Dictionary from the OAME node. You must specify which one of the following Rule Attributes Dictionaries you want to reload: charging, diameter, and policy. All relevant servers will be updated and the reloaded dictionary will immediately be used by the relevant nodes. A reboot is not required.

row.entry: The -n option controls where the reload request is sent. It will try the specified nodes one by one until it finds one that works. Use <host> to specify the server host name.
Indicates the server port number. The default port number is 3334.
The -t option is used to choose the dictionary you want what to reload. There are four reload-dictionaries: charging, diameter, and policy.

section.title: Examples
section.p: The following examples show the result when reloading the charging, diameter, and policy dictionaries.
